# Changelog

## v1.4.0
* Should allow to return response object, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2342
* Should allow to customize controllers domain name

## v1.3.1
* Fixed: should expose correct structure of context for service-client-ebay, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2341

## v1.3.0
* Added support for request.body parameters in context.parameters object

## v1.2.1
* Fixed implementation for Readable stream

## v1.2.0
* Added config injection

## v1.1.0
* Added folder based action resolution with filter support
